casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

December 24, 2009

[Cite as 12/24/2009 Case Announcements, 2009-Ohio-6825.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In re Hughley.

On September 16, 2009, this court found Kevin Hughley to be a vexatious litigator under S.Ct.Prae.R. XIV(5)(B). This court further ordered that Hughley was prohibited from continuing or instituting legal proceedings in this court without first obtaining leave. On December 18, 2009, Hughley submitted a motion for leave to file a writ of mandamus. Upon review of the proffered motion for leave,

It is ordered by the court that Kevin Hughley’s motion for leave is denied.
